intro: Erigeron caldasii, commonly known as the Caldas aster, is a flowering plant native to Colombia. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, characterized by its composite flower heads composed of ray and disk flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as cloud forests, where it thrives in cool, humid conditions.
